General.Name: Paragon Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Paragon Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells vacuum sputtering products. It provides EMI/ESD product solutions. The company offers 3C functional coating used in notebook computers, tablets, AIO, smart PC, automotive computers, and military computers; 3C appearance coating used in mobile phone and tablet back cover, laptop A\C pieces, smart watch bezel, smart home appliance panels, AIO back cover, Mini PC case, game console case and game handle products; and wheel rim appearance sputtering services. It also engages in the wholesale and retail of automobile and locomotive parts and equipment. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Huaya Science Park, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
